_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_LIST_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (OFFER_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, CATENTRY_ID NUMBER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (OFFER_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_LIST_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT O.OFFER_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID FROM OFFER O, (SELECT MAX(O.PRECEDENCE) MAX_PRECEDENCE, O.TRADEPOSCN_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID FROM OFFER O, TRADEPOSCN T, STORECENT S, STORETPC TS, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE T.TRADEPOSCN_ID = TS.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND S.STOREENT_ID = TS.STOREENT_ID AND TS.STTPCUSG_ID = 1 AND O.TRADEPOSCN_ID = T.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = S.CATENTRY_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = CE.CATENTRY_ID AND (O.STARTDATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > O.STARTDATE) AND (O.ENDDATE IS NULL OR O.ENDDATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND O.PUBLISHED = 1 AND (O.MINIMUMQUANTITY IN (1, 0) OR O.MINIMUMQUANTITY IS NULL) GROUP BY O.TRADEPOSCN_ID, O.CATENTRY_ID ) FILTER WHERE O.TRADEPOSCN_ID = FILTER.TRADEPOSCN_ID AND O.CATENTRY_ID = FILTER.CATENTRY_ID AND O.PRECEDENCE = FILTER.MAX_PRECEDENCE AND (O.STARTDATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > O.STARTDATE) AND (O.ENDDATE IS NULL OR O.ENDDATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND O.PUBLISHED = 1 ORDER BY OFFER_ID

_config:table.definition: CREATE VIEW VI_LISTPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# AS SELECT CATENTRY_ID, LISTAGG(PRICE, '||') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID) AS PRICE FROM ( SELECT L.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID, 'listprice_'||P.CURRENCY ||':'||P.PRICE PRICE FROM OFFERPRICE P, TI_LIST_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# L, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE P.OFFER_ID = L.OFFER_ID AND CE.CATENTTYPE_ID <> 'BundleBean' AND CE.CATENTRY_ID = L.CATENTRY_ID ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID, PRICE DESC, CURRENCY) GROUP BY CATENTRY_ID
_config:table.name: VI_LISTPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:table.definition: CREATE VIEW VI_LBUNDLEPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# AS SELECT CATENTRY_ID, LISTAGG(PRICE, '||') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID) AS PRICE FROM ( SELECT CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT CATENTRY_ID, 'listprice_'||P.CURRENCY ||':'|| SUM(P.PRICE * cast(CATENTREL.QUANTITY as decimal)) PRICE FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# ITEM, CATENTREL, OFFERPRICE P, TI_LIST_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# L WHERE P.OFFER_ID = L.OFFER_ID AND ITEM.CATENTRY_ID = L.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD = ITEM.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATRELTYPE_ID ='BUNDLE_COMPONENT' AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# BUNDLE WHERE BUNDLE.CATENTRY_ID=CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) GROUP BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, P.CURRENCY ORDER BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) GROUP BY CATENTRY_ID
_config:table.name: VI_LBUNDLEPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:table.definition: CREATE VIEW VI_LDKITPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# AS SELECT CATENTRY_ID, LISTAGG(PRICE, '||') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID) AS PRICE FROM ( (SELECT CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT CATENTRY_ID, 'listprice_'||P.CURRENCY ||':'|| SUM(P.PRICE * cast(CATENTREL.QUANTITY as decimal)) PRICE FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# ITEM, CATENTREL, OFFERPRICE P, TI_LIST_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# L WHERE P.OFFER_ID = L.OFFER_ID AND ITEM.CATENTRY_ID=L.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=ITEM.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATRELTYPE_ID='PDK_COMPONENT' AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# DK WHERE DK.CATENTRY_ID=CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) GROUP BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, P.CURRENCY) UNION (SELECT DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID, 'listprice_'||P.CURRENCY ||':'|| SUM(P.PRICE * cast(DKPDCCOMPLIST.QUANTITY as decimal)) PRICE FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CHILD, DKPDCCATENTREL, DKPDCCOMPLIST, OFFERPRICE P, TI_LIST_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# L WHERE CHILD.CATENTRY_ID = DKPDCCOMPLIST.CATENTRY_ID AND DKPDCCOMPLIST.DKPREDEFCONF_ID = DKPDCCATENTREL.DKPREDEFCONF_ID AND L.CATENTRY_ID = CHILD.CATENTRY_ID AND DKPDCCATENTREL.SEQUENCE = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# DYNAMICKIT WHERE DYNAMICKIT.CATENTRY_ID = DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID AND DYNAMICKIT.CATENTTYPE_ID='DynamicKitBean') GROUP BY DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID,P.CURRENCY)) GROUP BY CATENTRY_ID
_config:table.name: VI_LDKITPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#
